tourPackages.title: Marrakech, Medina
tourPackages.description: Marrakech, a vibrant city nestled at the foothills of the Atlas Mountains, is a mesmerizing blend of ancient history and modern charm. Known for its bustling souks, historic palaces, and lush gardens, Marrakech offers an immersive experience for every traveler. Wander through the labyrinthine streets of the Medina, marvel at the architectural splendor of the Koutoubia Mosque, and soak in the lively atmosphere of Jemaa el-Fna square. With its rich culture, tantalizing cuisine, and stunning landscapes, Marrakech promises an unforgettable adventure.

Guided tour of the Medina and visit to Jemaa el-Fna.
Visit to Koutoubia Mosque and Bahia Palace.
Explore Majorelle Garden and the Saadian Tombs.
Day trip to the Atlas Mountains and Ourika Valley.
Shopping in the souks and leisure time.
Departure from Marrakech.

tourPackages.title: Hassan II Mosque
tourPackages.description: Hassan II Mosque, located in Casablanca, is one of the largest mosques in the world and a masterpiece of modern Islamic architecture. Built partly on the Atlantic Ocean, the mosque boasts a stunning minaret, intricate tilework, and a retractable roof, making it a must-visit landmark in Morocco.

tourPackages.title: Chefchaouen
tourPackages.description: Chefchaouen, known as the "Blue Pearl" of Morocco, is a picturesque town nestled in the Rif Mountains. Renowned for its striking blue-washed buildings and charming streets, Chefchaouen offers a unique and serene atmosphere, making it a popular destination for travelers seeking beauty and tranquility.

tourPackages.title: Djemaa El Fna
tourPackages.description: Djemaa el-Fna is the vibrant main square in Marrakech, Morocco, renowned for its dynamic atmosphere and cultural richness. By day, it's a bustling market filled with vendors and entertainers, while at night, it transforms into a lively hub of food stalls, music, and performances, offering an unforgettable experience.

tourPackages.title: Ouzoud Falls
tourPackages.description: Ouzoud Falls, located in the Atlas Mountains of Morocco, is one of the country's most stunning natural wonders. With its cascading waterfalls plunging over 100 meters, lush surroundings, and picturesque setting, Ouzoud Falls offers a serene escape and spectacular photo opportunities.

tourPackages.title: Yankari National Park
tourPackages.description: Yankari National Park, located in northeastern Nigeria, is a premier wildlife reserve known for its diverse ecosystems and rich wildlife. Home to elephants, baboons, and various bird species, the park also features natural springs and scenic landscapes, making it a top destination for nature enthusiasts and adventure seekers.

tourPackages.title: Olumo Rock
tourPackages.description: Olumo Rock, located in Abeokuta, Nigeria, is a striking natural monument offering panoramic views of the city and surrounding areas. The rock is a popular tourist destination known for its historical significance, breathtaking vistas, and unique climbing experience.

tourPackages.title: Lekki Conservation Centre
tourPackages.description: Lekki Conservation Centre, located in Lagos, Nigeria, is a vibrant nature reserve dedicated to preserving local flora and fauna. The center features an impressive canopy walkway, wildlife sightings, and lush greenery, offering an immersive experience in Nigeria's diverse ecosystems.

tourPackages.title: Obudu Mountain Resort Expedition
tourPackages.description: Obudu Mountain Resort, located in Cross River State, Nigeria, is a premier highland retreat known for its stunning landscapes and cool climate. Nestled in the lush mountains, the resort offers breathtaking views, a cable car ride, and various outdoor activities, making it a perfect destination for relaxation and adventure.

tourPackages.title: Nike Art Gallery Tour
tourPackages.description: Nike Art Gallery, located in Lagos, Nigeria, is a premier art destination showcasing an extensive collection of traditional and contemporary African art. The gallery offers a vibrant cultural experience with diverse artworks, including sculptures, paintings, and textiles, reflecting Nigeria's rich artistic heritage.

itinerary.description: Arrival in Nairobi and transfer to Mount Kenya base camp.
Begin trekking to the first camp and acclimatize.
Trek to higher camp with scenic views of the mountain.
Summit attempt and return to base camp.
Descent to lower camp and rest.
Final descent to the base and transfer to Nairobi.
Departure from Nairobi.

tourPackages.title: Lalibela Rock-Hewn Churches Tour
tourPackages.description: The Rock-Hewn Churches of Lalibela are a UNESCO World Heritage site and a marvel of medieval engineering. Carved directly into rock, these ancient churches are renowned for their unique architecture and spiritual significance, offering a profound cultural and historical experience.

itinerary.description: Arrival in Addis Ababa and transfer to Lalibela.
Guided tour of the Rock-Hewn Churches of Lalibela.
Explore additional churches and local historical sites.
Visit to local markets and cultural sites in Lalibela.
Day trip to nearby historic and scenic locations.
Relax and enjoy leisure activities or additional exploration.
Return to Addis Ababa and departure.

tourPackages.title: Aksum Historical Tour
tourPackages.description: Aksum, an ancient city in northern Ethiopia, is renowned for its historical significance and archaeological treasures. Known for its impressive stelae, ancient obelisks, and the Church of St. Mary of Zion, Aksum offers a deep dive into Ethiopia's rich cultural and historical heritage.
